meanings.definition: Treat with a vaccine to produce immunity against a disease.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will vaccinate the child to keep them safe from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: It is important to vaccinate your pets to prevent them from getting certain illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The superhero decided to vaccinate the city against the evil virus, saving everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a vaccine, vaccinating his mind against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The vaccine needle will vaccinate you against the flu, like a shield of protection.

meanings.definition: Administer a vaccine to someone to protect them against a disease.
meanings.sent1: Parents should vaccinate their children to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent2: The nurse will vaccinate the students before the school year starts.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut had to vaccinate the alien visitors to prevent an intergalactic outbreak.
meanings.sent4: Her love was a vaccine, vaccinating his heart against loneliness.
meanings.sent5: The doctor will vaccinate you against measles, ensuring your safety from the disease.
